        <div class="module-available-on">
    <h2 class="c-subheading-2">Available on</h2>
    <div>
                <a href="/en-us/store/top-paid/games/xbox?gameCapabilities=ConsoleGen9Optimized"
                    aria-label="Products available on Xbox Series X|S"
                    data-m='{"pid":"1694533106","cS":"Reco","id":"n1m2r4a2","sN":1,"aN":"m2r4a2","tags":{"chrtname":"top-paid","devicetype":"xbox","prdType":"games"}}'                    class="c-tag">
                    <span class="c-glyph svg-xbox-series-x">
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 2048 2048" width="20" height="20">
                                <path d="M832 384q-26 0-45-19t-19-45q0-26 19-45t45-19q26 0 45 19t19 45q0 26-19 45t-45 19zM512 0h1024v2048H512V0zm896 1920V128H640v1792h128v-896h128v896h512z" />
                            </svg>
                    </span>
                    Xbox Series X|S
                </a>
                <a href="/en-us/store/top-paid/games/xbox"
                    aria-label="Products available on Xbox One"
                    data-m='{"pid":"1694533106","cS":"Reco","id":"n2m2r4a2","sN":2,"aN":"m2r4a2","tags":{"chrtname":"top-paid","devicetype":"xbox","prdType":"games"}}'                    class="c-tag">
                    <span class="c-glyph glyph-xbox-one-console">

                    Xbox One
                </a>
    </div>

    </div>

                <div>    <div  id="CapabilitiesModule" data-m='{"cN":"CapabilitiesModule","cT":"Module_onestore-capabilitiesmodule","id":"m3r4a2","sN":3,"aN":"r4a2"}'  data-module-id="PDP|OverviewModuleContainerId|OneStore-RowLayoutContainer|CapabilitiesModule|OneStore-CapabilitiesModule">
        <div class="module-capabilities">
    <h2 class="c-subheading-2">Capabilities</h2>
    <div>
                <a href="/en-us/store/top-paid/games/xbox?numberOfPlayers=SinglePlayer&amp;category="
                   aria-label="Products supporting Single player"
                   data-m='{"pid":"-983237966","cS":"Reco","id":"n1m3r4a2","sN":1,"aN":"m3r4a2","tags":{"chrtname":"top-paid","devicetype":"xbox","prdType":"games"}}'                   class="c-tag">Single player</a>
                <div class="c-tag">Xbox Live achievements</div>
                <div class="c-tag">Xbox Live cloud saves</div>
    </div>

    </div>
    <div  id="pdpDescriptionBlock" data-m='{"cN":"pdpDescriptionBlock","cT":"Module_onestore-productdescription","id":"m4r4a2","sN":4,"aN":"r4a2"}'  data-module-id="PDP|OverviewTab|coreui-region|pdpDescriptionBlock|OneStore-ProductDescription">
        
    <div class="context-product-detail-overview module-screenshots-description" data-grid="col-12">
        <div class="m-product-detail-overview">
            <div data-grid="col-12 stack-2">
                


<div data-grid="col-12 stack-2" class="m-product-detail-information f-detail-only">
    <div data-grid="col-12">
        <div data-grid="col-12">
            <h2 class="c-subheading-2">Description</h2>
            <div class="c-content-toggle">

                    <p id="product-description" data-f-expanded="false" class="m-product-detail-description c-paragraph f-lean max-height-override srv_description f-media-product" itemprop="description">
                        Endless arcade shoot-em-up action with just ONE button - Switch directions whenever you shoot!

Calling all pilots: Earth is under alien attack! Your assistance is required! No experience necessary.

ONE BUTTON:
Piloting an advanced star fighter with just one button is simple: you switch, you shoot. Every shot fired changes your direction, and mastering this is the key to becoming a legend among the stars. Timing is everything!

QUICK. SIMPLE. CHALLENGING:
Don&#39;t underestimate its simplicity; this game tests your reflexes like no other! And while your ship might become stardust in a matter of seconds, you can instantly jump back in for &quot;just one more go&quot;.

RETRO ARCADE FEEL:
A love letter to arcade classics with crunchy pixel art, chiptune soundtrack, authentic cabinet artwork and compulsive gameplay. Only now you don&#39;t need a stack of coins to stand a chance at getting a High Score.

COLOUR PALETTES:
Includes an Xbox exclusive colour palette plus you can unlock 64 palettes that completely change the look of everything in the game. Choose from 8-bit favourites or create your own!

PORTRAIT MODE:
At the touch of a button your screen rotates into portrait mode (a.k.a. TATE Mode) for a truly authentic arcade experience.
                    </p>
                                            <button id="description-more-button" class="cli_clickActionOverride srv_description_button" data-f-more="Show More" data-f-less="Show less" aria-controls="product-description" aria-expanded="false" data-f-show="15" data-bi-dnt="" data-bi-mto="">Show More</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="c-group" data-grid="col-12 stack-1">
            </div>
</div>            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    </div>

    <div class="row-layout-container " data-grid="col-12" aria-label='What's new and features' >
        <div>
                <div>    <div  id="features" data-m='{"cN":"features","cT":"Module_onestore-productfeatures","id":"m8r4a2","sN":8,"aN":"r4a2"}'  data-module-id="PDP|whatsNewAndFeaturesRow|OneStore-RowLayoutContainer|features|OneStore-ProductFeatures">
        
    <div data-grid="col-12" class="m-rich-content-block srv_features" id="productfeatures">
        <h2 class="c-heading-4">Features</h2>
        <ul class="c-list f-bare" dir="ltr">
                <li>Endless arcade shoot-em-up action with just ONE button</li>
                <li>Xbox exclusive colour palette option</li>
                <li> 64 colour palettes to unlock or create your own</li>
                <li>Portrait mode (a.k.a. TATE mode) for an authentic arcade experience</li>
        </ul>
    </div>

                </li>
                <li role="presentation" id="cli_reportanapp-reason_4" class="c-menu-item">
                    <a role="menuitem" class="cli_reportanapp-reason" aria-checked="false" data-query-key="reportanapp-reason" data-query-value="4" data-display-caption="Privacy concerns" data-report-caption="Privacy concerns" data-bi-dnt="" data-bi-mto="">Privacy concerns</a>
                </li>
                <li role="presentation" id="cli_reportanapp-reason_5" class="c-menu-item">

                </li>
        </ul>
    </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="c-textarea form-group">
                            <div data-grid="col-12">
                                <label class="c-label cli_label" for="reportanapp-modal-text" data-default-text="How you found the violation and any other useful info"

                                0/1000
                            </span>
                        </div>
                    </div>

        <script>
            if (window.addEventListener) {
                window.addEventListener("load", createSilentAuthFrame, false);
            } else if (window.attachEvent) {
                window.attachEvent("onload", createSilentAuthFrame);
            } else {
                window.onload = createSilentAuthFrame;
            }

            function InvokeSSOFrame(src) {
                var i = document.createElement("iframe");
                i.src = src;
                i.setAttribute("width", "0");
                i.setAttribute("height", "0");
                i.setAttribute("border", "0");
                i.setAttribute("frameborder", "0");
                i.setAttribute("style", "display: none");
                i.style = "display: none";
                document.body.appendChild(i);
            }

            function RefreshRemoteSSOSession(isUserAuthenticatedApi, silentPassport) {
                require(['jqReady!'], function ($) {
                    $.ajax(isUserAuthenticatedApi, {
                        type: "GET",
                        contentType: "text/plain",
                        xhrFields: {
                            withCredentials: true
                        },
                        crossDomain: true,
                        success: function (data) {
                            if (data.Status !== "Authenticated") {
                                InvokeSSOFrame(silentPassport);
                            }
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function createSilentAuthFrame() {
                var SSOCookieName = "ONERFSSO";
                if (document.cookie.indexOf(SSOCookieName) === -1) {
                    if ("False" === "True" && 3 !== 0) {
                            RefreshRemoteSSOSession("https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/IsUserAuthenticated", "https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/MeSilentPassport");
                            RefreshRemoteSSOSession("https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/IsUserAuthenticated", "https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/MeSilentPassport");
                            RefreshRemoteSSOSession("https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/IsUserAuthenticated", "https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/MeSilentPassport");
                    }
                    else {
                        InvokeSSOFrame("https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/onerf/MeSilentPassport");
                    }
                    document.cookie = SSOCookieName + "=1";
                }
            }

        </script>

    <div  id="pdpDescriptionBlock" data-m='{"cN":"pdpDescriptionBlock","cT":"Module_onestore-productdescription","id":"m4r4a2","sN":4,"aN":"r4a2"}'  data-module-id="PDP|OverviewTab|coreui-region|pdpDescriptionBlock|OneStore-ProductDescription">
        
    <div class="context-product-detail-overview module-screenshots-description" data-grid="col-12">
        <div class="m-product-detail-overview">
            <div data-grid="col-12 stack-2">
                


<div data-grid="col-12 stack-2" class="m-product-detail-information f-detail-only">
    <div data-grid="col-12">
        <div data-grid="col-12">
            <h2 class="c-subheading-2">Description</h2>
            <div class="c-content-toggle">

                    <p id="product-description" data-f-expanded="false" class="m-product-detail-description c-paragraph f-lean max-height-override srv_description f-media-product" itemprop="description">
                        Endless arcade shoot-em-up action with just ONE button - Switch directions whenever you shoot!

Calling all pilots: Earth is under alien attack! Your assistance is required! No experience necessary.

ONE BUTTON:
Piloting an advanced star fighter with just one button is simple: you switch, you shoot. Every shot fired changes your direction, and mastering this is the key to becoming a legend among the stars. Timing is everything!

QUICK. SIMPLE. CHALLENGING:
Don&#39;t underestimate its simplicity; this game tests your reflexes like no other! And while your ship might become stardust in a matter of seconds, you can instantly jump back in for &quot;just one more go&quot;.

RETRO ARCADE FEEL:
A love letter to arcade classics with crunchy pixel art, chiptune soundtrack, authentic cabinet artwork and compulsive gameplay. Only now you don&#39;t need a stack of coins to stand a chance at getting a High Score.

COLOUR PALETTES:
Includes an Xbox exclusive colour palette plus you can unlock 64 palettes that completely change the look of everything in the game. Choose from 8-bit favourites or create your own!

PORTRAIT MODE:
At the touch of a button your screen rotates into portrait mode (a.k.a. TATE Mode) for a truly authentic arcade experience.
                    </p>
                                            <button id="description-more-button" class="cli_clickActionOverride srv_description_button" data-f-more="Show More" data-f-less="Show less" aria-controls="product-description" aria-expanded="false" data-f-show="15" data-bi-dnt="" data-bi-mto="">Show More</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="c-group" data-grid="col-12 stack-1">
            </div>
</div>            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    </div>

    <div  id="whatsNewAndFeaturesRow" data-m='{"cN":"whatsNewAndFeaturesRow","cT":"Module_onestore-RowLayoutContainer","id":"m7r4a2","sN":7,"aN":"r4a2"}'  data-module-id="PDP|OverviewTab|coreui-region|whatsNewAndFeaturesRow|OneStore-RowLayoutContainer">
        


    <div class="row-layout-container " data-grid="col-12" aria-label='What's new and features' >
        <div>
                <div>    <div  id="features" data-m='{"cN":"features","cT":"Module_onestore-productfeatures","id":"m8r4a2","sN":8,"aN":"r4a2"}'  data-module-id="PDP|whatsNewAndFeaturesRow|OneStore-RowLayoutContainer|features|OneStore-ProductFeatures">
        
    <div data-grid="col-12" class="m-rich-content-block srv_features" id="productfeatures">
        <h2 class="c-heading-4">Features</h2>
        <ul class="c-list f-bare" dir="ltr">
                <li>Endless arcade shoot-em-up action with just ONE button</li>
                <li>Xbox exclusive colour palette option</li>
                <li> 64 colour palettes to unlock or create your own</li>
                <li>Portrait mode (a.k.a. TATE mode) for an authentic arcade experience</li>
        </ul>
    </div>

    </div>

                                <button class="c-button cli_close" type="button" data-js-dialog-hide data-m='{"cN":"SubmitReportCancelButton","id":"nn4c6c7c8c6c4c3c3c3c3c1m9r4a2","sN":4,"aN":"c6c7c8c6c4c3c3c3c3c1m9r4a2"}'>
                                    Cancel
                                </button>
                            </div>
</form>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    </div>
        </div>

                </section>

        <script>
            if (window.addEventListener) {
                window.addEventListener("load", createSilentAuthFrame, false);
            } else if (window.attachEvent) {
                window.attachEvent("onload", createSilentAuthFrame);
            } else {
                window.onload = createSilentAuthFrame;
            }

            function InvokeSSOFrame(src) {
                var i = document.createElement("iframe");
                i.src = src;
                i.setAttribute("width", "0");
                i.setAttribute("height", "0");
                i.setAttribute("border", "0");
                i.setAttribute("frameborder", "0");
                i.setAttribute("style", "display: none");
                i.style = "display: none";
                document.body.appendChild(i);
            }

            function RefreshRemoteSSOSession(isUserAuthenticatedApi, silentPassport) {
                require(['jqReady!'], function ($) {
                    $.ajax(isUserAuthenticatedApi, {
                        type: "GET",
                        contentType: "text/plain",
                        xhrFields: {
                            withCredentials: true
                        },
                        crossDomain: true,
                        success: function (data) {
                            if (data.Status !== "Authenticated") {
                                InvokeSSOFrame(silentPassport);
                            }
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function createSilentAuthFrame() {
                var SSOCookieName = "ONERFSSO";
                if (document.cookie.indexOf(SSOCookieName) === -1) {
                    if ("False" === "True" && 1 !== 0) {
                            RefreshRemoteSSOSession("https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/IsUserAuthenticated", "https://account.xbox.com/en-us/mscomhp/onerf/MeSilentPassport");
                    }
                    else {
                        InvokeSSOFrame("https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/onerf/MeSilentPassport");
                    }
                    document.cookie = SSOCookieName + "=1";
                }
            }

        </script>
